document.full_text: freddie roach, widely acknowledged as the best boxing trainer in the world, said friday he would work with the united states team on a volunteer basis in preparation for the london olympics in 2012.
document.title: sports briefing | boxing: freddie roach to join olympians
lines_and_colors: freddie roach, widely acknowledged as the best boxing trainer in the world, said friday he would work with the united states team on a volunteer basis in preparation for the london olympics in 2012.
